text:
Hey all,

Wasn't there a feature in themes that automatically fetched thumbnail previews without needing to add them manually, or am I misremembering something? I remember it used to auto-populate before.

That area definitely needs some work, I'm constantly going back and forth switching between themes as I'm managing multiple of things at once.

Wish there was a way to specify theme to a particular 'segment' like Landing pages, Web pages Blogs, etc. similar to how you can do it with domains.

<@U053KDY5TV1> Try adding this in theme.json file

`"is_available_for_new_content":false`
Hi <@U06KNBYJKUJ>, I know! They need to improve that section. Yes I already added that to my child theme, but there is no theme.json file on Marketplace themes

mine auto populate with a snapshot, here is my template code

<!--
  templateType: page
  isAvailableForNewContent: true
  label: Technology Page

-->
